LESLIE M. MARSHALL
St. John’s
Dear Dr. Hill,
I wrote Marshall McLuhan the other day to ask
where I might get a copy of his recent report - or reports -
on Television and Society, and he told me I might obtain a
mimeographicopy from your office. I should be grateful if
you could send me one - and if there is a charge for it,would
you send along a bill so that I might arrange the necessary
payment. I should also welcome any additional information
you might be able to send about your uProject in understanding
New Media.11
With many thanks,
Yours jjfir^cerely,
-
Ross McLean. ^
